basics.name: Kelsey Niederer
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Yoga Teacher turned Software Developer seeking a technical position building tools and platforms that contribute to the greater good of the world, and all beings that reside here.

work.name: LaunchCode
work.summary: Guiding a group of students as their principal education and support point of contact throughout LaunchCodeâ€™s LC101 Coding Bootcamp. Areas of focus: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Angular, Java, Spring MVC, and Bootstrap

work.name: Bricks 4 Kidz
work.summary: Lead workshops teaching concepts of Science, Technology, Engineering, & Mathematics to children ages 6-12 using Legos and other education technologies

work.name: Yoga Buzz
work.summary: Design websites for Yoga Buzz, a 501c-3 nonprofit whose mission is to make yoga more physically and financially accessible. I made this website using WordPress, HTML, CSS, and Elementor GUI Editor

work.name: Brick City Yoga
work.summary: Leading groups of people through yoga asanas, or poses, and meditation. Highlights: Deep Stretch Yoga, Surviving Mercury Retrograde Workshop, and Vinyl & Vinyasa series, where I lead Vinyasa flow classes to classic rock albums on vinyl.

work.name: Math Tutor
work.summary: Pre-Algebra, Algebra I, Algebra II, Geometry, Trigonometry, Calculus, College Algebra, ACT/SAT Prep, Vocation/Logic Assesment Prep

work.name: Project - Home Loan Calculator and Comparison Tool
work.summary: A mortgage calculator that allows buyers to compare their home loan options. Created with Java using IntelliJ, Spring MVC Framework, ThymeLeaf views, and styled with BootStrap CSS.   https://github.com/Kelseyniederer/home-loan-comparison-tool

work.name: Project - Our Family's Doing Yoga Website
work.summary: Designed and created website for St. Louis author SonJoria Sydnor and her book titled 'Our Family's Doing Yoga'. I made this site using WordPress, HTML, CSS, and Elementor GUI Editor

work.name: Project - Yoga Buzz Website
work.summary: Designed and created website for Yoga Buzz, a 501c3 Non-Profit in St. Louis, MO whose mission is to make yoga more accessible to people of different backgrounds, body types, and income levels. I created this website using WordPress, HTML, CSS, and Elementor GUI Editor

volunteer.summary: Assisting with setup, execution, and breakdown of Yoga Buzz events around St. Louis. Setting up/breaking down A/V equipment. Demonstrating Yoga classes using a chair so people with differently-abled bodies can practice safely

skills.name: Other Skills
keywords: Strong desire to learn and grow
